Hero.header2: We've built our life and business insurance products from the ground up to both protect you and reward you.

plan.name: Individuals and Family
plan.description: If you die, we give you a proper send-off and help your family keep living their best life

plan.name: Business Protection
plan.description: Protecting your business means staying one step ahead, and helping you prevent problems before they happen.

keypoint1.keypoint: We help make sure you have no gaps
keypoint1.description: With Swagata, you get comprehensive, not patchwork protection.

keypoint2.description: You get a protective partner to help prevent issues from happening in the first place.

Why.text-primary: Built from the ground up for the internet generation.
Why.text-tertiary: Swagata insurance is a digital-first insurer, using technology to make life insurance simpler, smarter and more rewarding.

3point.h3: Do everything online in no time. No more paperwork
3point.p: Get a quoted and covered in under 10 minutes online.

3point.h3: You`re covered instantly with Swagata Insurance
3point.p: Buy your insurance online and get instant cover, before you`ve even paid for it.

3point.h3: Skip premiums, For when life happens
3point.p: We let you proactively skip premiums without losing cover on your bonus.

Feature1.h2: Raise your expectation of what your insurer should deliver.
Feature1.description: We think insurance should be more about living. So we've designed our products to protect and create wealth while you're alive

Feature2.p: Your safety is what drives us to provide an exceptional standard of service.
Protect your valuables so their stories continue for generations to come.
Extra protection for you and the people you care about.
The in-house Risk Engineering Services team provides customized services.
Your safety is what drives us to provide exceptional standard of service.
We help our clients customized Industrial Hygiene services to meet each of their unique needs.
